name: Possessor (Daddysucc5000)
description:
A short game where you shoot enemies and possess their dead bodies.

Made in 3 days for Wowie jam 3.0

Since it was made in such a short amount of time the game is very short and riddled with bugs. Also, some of the placeholder art wasn't replaced at all so that's why some of it might look bad or out of place.
